mapper.select: SELECT `index` AS 'index', `movie_index` AS 'movie_index', `cinema_index` AS 'cinema_index', `screening_date` AS 'screening_date', `screening_time` AS 'screening_time' FROM `terabox`.`screening_info` WHERE `screening_date` = #{screeningDate} AND `cinema_index` = #{cinemaIndex}

SELECT `screeningInfo`.`index` AS 'index', `screeningInfo`.`movie_index` AS 'movieIndex', `screeningInfo`.`cinema_index` AS 'cinemaIndex', `screeningInfo`.`screening_date` AS 'screeningDate', `screeningInfo`.`screening_time` AS 'screeningTime', `cinema`.`index` AS `cinemaIndex`, `cinema`.`theater_index` AS `theaterIndex`, `cinema`.`number` AS `cinemaNumber`, `theater`.`index` AS `theaterIndex`, `theater`.`region_code` AS `regionCode`, `theater`.`name` AS `theaterName`, `region`.`text` AS `regionText`, `movie`.`title` AS `movieTitle` FROM `terabox`.`screening_info` AS `screeningInfo` JOIN `terabox`.`cinemas` AS `cinema` ON `screeningInfo`.`cinema_index` = `cinema`.`index` JOIN `terabox`.`theaters` AS `theater` ON `cinema`.`theater_index` = `theater`.`index` JOIN `terabox`.`regions` AS `region` ON `theater`.`region_code` = `region`.`code` # LEFT JOIN을 하면 불러오는 값이 null일 때 따로 컬럼을 생성해서 null 값을 입력한 후 가져온다. # 그냥 JOIN하면 null일 때 아무것도 안가져와짐 LEFT JOIN `terabox`.`movies` AS `movie` ON `screeningInfo`.`movie_index` = `movie`.`index` WHERE `screening_date` = #{screeningDate} AND `cinema_index` = #{cinemaIndex}
